description: Fall Detection System Configuration for Parkinson's Patients

threshold_descriptions.hip_height_threshold: Normalized hip center Y position (0=top, 1=bottom). Fall suspected when > threshold
threshold_descriptions.torso_angle_threshold: Angle of torso from vertical in degrees. Fall suspected when > threshold
threshold_descriptions.head_velocity_threshold: Vertical velocity of head movement (normalized). Fall suspected when > threshold
threshold_descriptions.hip_velocity_threshold: Vertical velocity of hip movement (normalized). Fall suspected when > threshold
threshold_descriptions.aspect_ratio_threshold: Width/Height ratio of body bounding box. Fall suspected when > threshold
threshold_descriptions.vertical_speed_threshold: Overall vertical movement speed. Fall suspected when > threshold
threshold_descriptions.shoulder_hip_ratio_threshold: Vertical distance between shoulders and hips (normalized). Fall suspected when < threshold
threshold_descriptions.ground_contact_threshold: Hip position indicating ground contact. Fall confirmed when > threshold
